page.name: FBLA (Future Business Leaders of America)
page.description:
FBLA is the largest business Career and Technical Student Organization in the World. FBLA's mission is to inspire and prepare students to become community-minded business leaders in a global society through relevant career preparation and leadership experiences. FBLA aims to develop competent, aggressive business leadership, strengthen the confidence of students in themselves and in their work, encourage members to pursue individual projects for the betterment of their community, encourage scholarship and promote school loyalty and develop character, prepare for useful citizenship, and foster patriotism among many others.

Students will have the opportunity to prove their knowledge and technical expertise in a vast variety of business-related skills at Ohio's State Leadership Conference in the Spring, and will have the chance to get nationally recognized at FBLA's National Leadership Conference in the Summer.
